author: Warhammer
description:
Saber Interactive and Focus Entertainment are thrilled to welcome the third major content update for their 2024 blockbuster Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2. Titled “Datavault”, this update brings more free content and much-requested quality-of-life improvements to all players whilst granting Season Pass owners with evermore cosmetics to customize their Space Marines.
Space Marine 2 is available now on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Steam and the Epic Games Store.

title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 – Datavault Update Trailer
